H0.text: Who wept on the shoulder of the Duchess of Kent after losing the Wimbledon Women's Singles Final against Steffi Graf in 1993. Martina Navratilova

H1.text: Who wept on the shoulder of the Duchess of Kent after losing the Wimbledon Women's Singles Final against Steffi Graf in 1993. Arantxa Sánchez Vicario

H2.text: Who wept on the shoulder of the Duchess of Kent after losing the Wimbledon Women's Singles Final against Steffi Graf in 1993. Conchita Martínez

H3.text: Who wept on the shoulder of the Duchess of Kent after losing the Wimbledon Women's Singles Final against Steffi Graf in 1993. Jana Novotná

A4.text: a distraught Novotná burst into tears and cried on the Duchess of Kent's shoulder
